sections.title: I am the Lord your God; you shall not have strange gods before me

questions.text: Have I placed anything above God—success, money, pleasure, or comfort?
Have I made time for daily prayer and spiritual reading?
Have I trusted in God’s will, even in difficulty?
Have I received the sacraments regularly with reverence?
Have I allowed busyness or distractions to replace my devotion?
Have I shown God’s love to others in how I live?
Have I repented of times I’ve doubted or turned from God?

sections.title: You shall not take the name of the Lord your God in vain

questions.text: Have I spoken God’s name with reverence or used it carelessly?
Have I sworn false oaths or used holy names in anger or frustration?
Have I taken sacred things lightly or irreverently?
Have I been silent when others misused God’s name?
Have I honored God in how I speak about my faith?
Have I taken my baptismal promises seriously?
Have I prayed with a sincere and loving heart?

sections.title: Remember to keep holy the Lord’s Day

questions.text: Have I attended Sunday Mass faithfully and on time?
Have I used Sundays to rest, worship, and renew my spirit?
Have I avoided unnecessary work and consumerism on Sunday?
Have I made Sunday different from other days?
Have I spent quality time with family or serving others on Sundays?
Have I encouraged others to honor the Lord’s Day?
Have I treated Sunday as a gift rather than a burden?

sections.title: Honor your father and your mother

questions.text: Have I shown respect and gratitude to my parents?
Have I helped and supported my parents when needed?
Have I been a peacemaker in my extended family?
Have I prayed for my parents, living and deceased?
Have I spoken respectfully about those in authority?
Have I honored those who raised or guided me?
Have I encouraged my children to love and respect their elders?
Have I hurt others through anger, hatred, or harsh words?
Have I forgiven those who have wronged me?
Have I nurtured grudges or refused to reconcile?
Have I protected the dignity of life at all stages?
Have I supported or promoted peace and justice?
Have I harmed others emotionally or spiritually?
Have I respected the lives of the vulnerable and suffering?
Have I been faithful to my spouse in thought, word, and deed?
Have I respected the sacredness of marriage and sexuality?
Have I avoided impure media, conversations, and temptations?
Have I sought purity of heart and modesty in action?
Have I honored my body and others’ as temples of the Holy Spirit?
Have I protected the emotional and spiritual bonds in my relationships?
Have I confessed and repented of any sins against chastity?
Have I taken anything that did not belong to me?
Have I been honest in my work and business dealings?
Have I used time and resources responsibly and fairly?
Have I paid debts and returned what I borrowed?
Have I shared generously with those in need?
Have I supported my parish and charitable causes?
Have I modeled honesty and integrity in daily life?

sections.title: You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor

questions.text: Have I told the truth even when it was difficult?
Have I avoided gossip, slander, or detraction?
Have I spoken kindly and fairly about others?
Have I judged others without knowing the facts?
Have I corrected lies or misunderstandings I helped create?
Have I honored others’ reputations and privacy?
Have I apologized for dishonest or harmful words?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s wife

questions.text: Have I entertained lustful thoughts or fantasies?
Have I envied others’ relationships or affections?
Have I flirted or acted inappropriately with others?
Have I kept proper emotional and physical boundaries?
Have I nurtured love and appreciation for my spouse?
Have I respected others’ marriages and relationships?
Have I turned to God for healing and strength in temptation?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s goods

questions.text: Have I been grateful for what I have?
Have I compared myself with others in envy?
Have I been content or constantly wanted more?
Have I valued people over possessions?
Have I praised God for the blessings others receive?
Have I practiced simplicity and stewardship?
Have I trusted that God provides what I need?
